title: Next Time You Do One For All
body:
Remove Darius as well lol im not salty i lost at all because i knew we would the moment i saw it was Darius, its just not that fun to fight against him. All spam Q and W then E when you try to escape then everyone R!!! easy ace in a matter of seconds haha plus you cant really kill them because heals upon heals. Just saying he creates a very unfun environment so id recommend removing him from One for All in the future.  

And to those who are not banning him id highly recommend you start :) you can beat him but the point of One for All isnt really to win, its to have fun and he is not that fun to fight.

replies.body:
My first OfA match this year was Raka vs Darius.

... We destroyed Darius...

Imagine 3 or 4 dunk-ults on one soraka who just won't die because her teammates are there, and you get the picture.

God i tried to do Soraka so many times but everyone dodges, then the one time i get her everyone buy me and my friend starts intentionally feeding... they dove the mid turret at level 1 over and over again giving the Anivia like 6 kills before 3 minutes...

Ugh, this is why I say we need OfA teambuild, so people can find the players who actually want to play the same champs. This is THE problem with OfA and I don't know why people can't see it. The majority pick everyone whines about is a minor issue, and in fact, majority pick is almost a necessary evil to minimize the damage. SO WHAT if you FINALLY get the champ you wanted after 10 games? Won't matter if everyone else in your team DOESN'T want it, and decides to ruin it for you hardcore. Or even if they don't try to ruin it, they suck at the champ, feed early as a result, and ultimately have a horrible time so that YOU can "get what you want" but not really.

OfA right now is all about 1 to 4 players suffering so that 1 to 4 players can have their say, and ultimately, it ends up wrecking it for everybody, regardless of who wins what vote.

I don't care about sucking at the champ, there are champs i cant play all that well so i dont really expect everyone to be amazing. It is the intentional losing that is the serious problem of One For All. Dodging i can deal with because it doesnt waste 20-50 minutes of my life, intentionally feeding however is the biggest dick move you can do. Its like a child who doesn't get what they want, they throw a fit and that is the best description i can give of the majority of this community, a bunch of whiney children who throw a tantrum when they don't get what they want.

I don't care about me or others sucking either, but other people do, and it wrecks the mood. There are several games where either a) players don't know what they're doing, and basically let everyone know they're not having fun, or b) players don't know what they're doing, but refuse to realize that, and will use their ignorance as an excuse to rage about picks.

A few games ago I got Lee Sin. I didn't vote for Lee Sin, don't play Lee Sin, and don't care to, but I still enjoyed it... ... except when I had to here some random dude go "Oh my gosh, who's idea was it to pick Lee Sin?", because we were, shocker, having trouble against Heimer. There's only so many face-palm poses I have in my repertoire, and not enough time in the 10 seconds after that comment to use all of them before going back to pwning Heimer (I know how to counterbuild. It wasn't that hard, for me at least, to deal with him.) Really? "Why pick Lee Sin?" Is that even in question?

I can have a lot more fun when I know that a) my allies are having fun, and b) if they're not, they won't use that as an excuse to make the dumbest illogical assessments of why the game is playing out the way it is. I want teambuild so that the people who want to, Step 1) Pick Darius, Step 2) Pick Darius again, and then Step 3) Pick Darius can do w/e the heck they please without making people who like variety suffer through the monotony. All the "spam Lux" crowd can go over in their corner, and people who actually want to, I don't know, TRY SOMETHING, can go in their corner and not be disturbed. Problem solved.

all the people who actually want to play Darius should do it in a normals... he is a stupid champion on OFA.  

Lux is the only champion i will dodge, like i hate dodgers, but i will lower myself to that level if we get Lux. If you just want to try it out because you think its fun, that is fine, but the moment someone says "pick lux we will win" i will dodge. Yes you are going to win with Lux any noob can spam spells and hers have the potential to either do a lot of damage or lead to a lot of damage and possibly a kill. Even someone who is bad with her, if they land her Root im most likely going to get a kill, if they land her slow, im most likely going to chain that into a kill... To everyone who thinks Lux might be fun SHE IS NOT FUN, AUTO-WINNING IS NOT FUN.

Meh idk, I myself have played champs i personally hated and had a blast the entire time. I had a game as my side Volibear vs enemy Kalistas and while I sucked and did crap. It was hilarious running in with the BEAR SQUAD and throwing and eating them all.
Play Viktor. OFA Viktor kicks the shit out of OFA Darius.

First off dont know when they are going to pick Darius, second its not really about beating him its about the fun. He is no fun to fight against unless you are someone who destroys him then its no fun for them. Darius just creates an unfun experience.

This might just be me and the fact that I don't play melee champs or have never played darius but....................we got him in OFA and got destroyed with him against ezreal.  2 of my teammates had darius mastery lvl 5 and the other two were competent at him ( I was the only weak link).  We ended up surrendering because it was so bad.

Yes there are champs that are clearly OP in terms of gameplay, but you can always balance that by having the right champion go against him.  I agree tho........I ban him everytime I play OFA.

He should just be perma-banned from the game mode :I, i know there are champs that do well against him but its never an all around fun experience with Darius, he is either crushing you or you are crushing him and one team is having no fun. At least with other champs you can come back or go even thus being a lot more fun.

I am taking it you haven't seen {{champion:74}}  or {{champion:80}}  yet? They make Darius look like a bitch. Kinda hard to kill them when you have 15 turrets next to you, on ready stuns, and everyone has Zhonyas and will build Void Staff if Darius even thinks of building MR.

Panth I don't even wanna talk about. Orbital drop team incoming! I had a game we were panth and we literally all ulted into the entire enemy team at once, half of them died since they couldn't get out in time to be perma stunned to death.

I have played Heimer in the current OfA and Panth in the last one, im not talking about beating Darius. I know he can be beat, hell if my team would have stopped complaining for 5 seconds we could have won the game. The issue is the lack of fun he brings to One For All unless you happen to counter-pick him, then its no fun for Darius players. Everyone only cares about winning for some reason, One For All is meant to be played for fun, Darius goes against this.
Just ban him
Ok and if im not first and the person who is doesn't listen?
then dodge, a five min penalty isn't bad
No, thats silly all because of one champion? why not just perma ban him....

> [{quoted}](name=Stephenizgod,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=MNMJcTHz,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-20T00:47:28.430+0000)
>
> No, thats silly all because of one champion? why not just perma ban him....

Because one person doesn't like a certain champion, no one else can play him? Also, you DO have a good idea of when he's going to be picked unless you can't catch on. People think he's op and an easy win, so any time he's not banned he's usually picked. Just fucking play Gnar. You can't lose to Darius with Gnar, and are unlikely to lose against anyone else with Gnar.

How is no one understanding what im saying? Idc about winning or losing in OFA, he just creates an incredibly unfun experience for either side, whether winning or losing. Darius on OFA is just a dumb champion to leave available thanks to his passive and ult. They removed Karthus and Teemo, why not Darius?

Because Karth has R to win. You can't build banshee when 5 ults are hitting you. Teemo it would literally be a map full of shrooms and no one would move. Darius actually has to get close to you and actually isnt that hard to kill. The person above you actually even told you an easy counter. Gnar. Little Gnar harrasses teh hell out of him and he if somehow grabs you, you hop away and take at most 1 or 2 hits, never allowing him the chance to kill you while you have a very high chance of killing him. Mega Gnar can 1 shot him in 1 rotation if during mini you did some damage to him. Even if it doesn't, you are tanky and he would be low so would be more focused on getting away then killing you.
ok but this isn't Ranked i dont want to have to counter-pick because someone forgot to ban Darius...
